screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .sle file in Steganos Safe 21
screenshot.caption: SLE file open in Steganos Safe 21

description: To create an SLE file with Steganos Safe, select Safe → Create... , then follow the prompts to specify the location, maximum file size, and password for the file. To adjust the settings of the Safe, select Safe → Settings... .

To open an SLE file with Steganos Safe, click Safe → Import , then enter the password to open the file. After opening the file, the drive stored in the file opens and becomes accessible, allowing files to be added or removed. Once the SLE file is closed, the drive is encrypted again and no longer accessible.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .sle file in Steganos Safe 21
images.caption: SLE file open in Steganos Safe 21
